mapper.select: SELECT id, entered as entryTime, fullpath, dateupdated, systemname, coalesce(decCount, 0) as decCount from roster r LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT d.rosterId AS rosterEntry, COUNT(*) AS decCount FROM decoder d GROUP BY rosterId) ON r.id = rosterEntry order by systemname
SELECT id, entered AS entryTime, fullpath, dateupdated, systemname FROM roster WHERE systemName = #{param1} AND fullPath = #{param2}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roster (entered, fullpath, systemName) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{fullPath}, #{systemName})
mapper.select: SELECT id, decoderFamily, decoderModel, dateUpdated AS updated FROM decoderType ORDER BY decoderFamily, decoderModel
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO decoderType (decoderfamily, decodermodel, dateupdated) VALUES (#{decoderFamily}, #{decoderModel}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

INSERT INTO Decoder (decoderid, filename, roadnumber, roadname, manufacturer, owner, dccaddress, productid, decoderTypeId, rosterid, dateUpdated) VALUES (#{decoderId}, #{fileName}, #{roadNumber}, #{roadName}, #{manufacturer}, #{owner}, #{dccAddress}, #{productId}, #{decoderTypeId}, #{rosterId}, #{dateUpdated})
